article.title: Enemy_%28disambiguation%29
article.paragraph: wiktionaryenemywikiquoteEnemiesAnenemyorfoeis an individual or group that is seen as forcefully adverse or threatening.
article.heading: Art, entertainment, and media

list.listitem: The Enemy, an alias ofMorgoth, a fictional character in Tolkien's legendarium
